item.title: How do u put on pictures on fourmes! can some one help
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“dragonaman, post:5, topic:152309”]thanks for telling[br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2007, 01:43:04 PM[/size][hr]wait image shack wat do i do on it![/quote]Once again,Don’t double post use the Modify Button.
On image shack you click Upload Pictures
Select the size for Forums and message boards,Then browse the image,then upload

item.title: How do u put on pictures on fourmes! can some one help
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Step 1-Upload the image/Screenshot to:
www.imageshack.us
Www.tinypic.com
Copy the 2nd one for Tinypic
For imageshack,scroll to bottom of page and copy the “hotlink”
Then copy and paste the code onto the forums
